testimonials.name: Sahil Saini
testimonials.review: “I feel SoChem is what that knits this huge department of ours together. At SoChem, we came together, had fun, learned, and grew”

testimonials.name: Shruti Yadav
testimonials.review: SoChem is more than just a society —it feels like a family. One of the most amazing things about SoChem is how we come together to celebrate various festivals, creating a close-knit and inclusive community. Overall,it offers a well-rounded experience, blending fun, learning, and professional development.

testimonials.name: Sonali Singh
testimonials.review: SoChem unites us with shared experiences, inspiring personal and academic growth. It’s a vibrant hub for connections, collaboration, and fun-filled events that enrich our journey, creating unforgettable memories and meaningful moments at every step.

testimonials.name: Suhani Singh
testimonials.review: I’m thrilled to be part of a team that embraces creativity and collaboration, making every day at Sochem enjoyable. Together, we achieve great results while having fun!

testimonials.name: Ghanishtha Chaware
testimonials.review: SoChem is the thread that brings our department together. It includes making connection with amazing people, learning, growing, and sharing unforgettable moments. It’s where we truly feel like a family.

testimonials.name: Ankit Pradhan
testimonials.review: Joining the Society of Chemical Engineers (Sochem) was pivotal during my first semester. Even after switching to Electrical Engineering, the support and guidance I received helped me navigate my branch change confidently. Sochem’s events foster camaraderie and teamwork, enriching my experience. I value the network and resources that will aid my future placements and internships. I’m proud to remain a member and look forward to staying connected with this supportive community.

testimonials.name: Ankit Kumar
testimonials.review: My time with the Society of Chemical Engineers (Sochem) during my first semester was incredibly impactful. Although I transitioned to Electrical Engineering, the mentorship and resources from Sochem were instrumental in helping me adjust. The engaging sessions and senior interactions made a significant difference in my journey. Additionally, the sports events organized by Sochem promote a wonderful team spirit. I’m excited to remain a member and continue benefiting from this supportive network as I prepare for internships and placements.
